==Profile==
Shion is a [[yumekui-baku]] and one of the clinical psychologists working at the [[Aisa Bathhouse]]. Her specialty is making refreshments, and her therapeutic techniques also often involve food.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Crisis at the Aisa Bathhouse}}</ref>

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Hyakujitsuhaku Shion:''' My apologies for not greeting you sooner!
:{{DIcon}} I'd like to book a therapy session.
::'''Hyakujitsuhaku Shion:''' Really? Now that would be my pleasure!
::'''Hyakujitsuhaku Shion:''' But I also have to help all these other guests sign in... Hmmm, what would [[Mizuki]] do?
::'''Hyakujitsuhaku Shion:''' I'm afraid I'll have to ask you to wait inside for a short while. I'll be with you as soon as possible!
:{{DIcon}} Need any help?
::'''Hyakujitsuhaku Shion:''' What? No, no, that wouldn't do...
::'''Hyakujitsuhaku Shion:''' You've been queuing too long and you're sick of waiting. That's it, isn't it? I'm so sorry!
::'''Hyakujitsuhaku Shion:''' Why don't you find a seat and rest for a while? I'll fetch you some refreshments.
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye.
::'''Hyakujitsuhaku Shion:''' Come back anytime!
{{Dialogue End}}
